name: Drive Like A Maniac
description:
Vehicular combat and physics shenanigans with 'Drive Like A Maniac'. In its current state, the game features many gameplay items, the player car, a wrecking ball, destructible buildings, a half-pipe and many more. It is intended as a test-bench / tech-demo, it is not a complete game.

The technologies it uses are C++, OpenGL, and the Bullet library for physics.
